title: Can't Add Items in a Item Set (Mac)
body: I can Drag a Item into the Item Set but it won't Add the Item in there and this has been happening for a while now...I have been trying to make a item Set for Sol {{champion:136}} And Yes I have tried to Restart League , Restart Mac... But To be honest I just think League Item Sets for Mac is just broken and I have done Research and I don't think anyone has made a Report about unable to add Items into a Item set So plz help me figure out this problem :D Thank you so much for reading my Report and I hope I can solve this so Everyone can Use Item sets on Mac

replies.body:
There's a known bug with dragging stuff inside the client if you're running macOS Sierra. Unfortunately, at the moment there's no fix, so as a workaround I recommend making updates to your item sets on another PC running any other OS than Sierra. The changes should be reflected on your Mac, since the item sets are now saved server-side.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Ahhhhh I have Mac Os Sierra xD and I have no PC so rip me

CRAP.. not what I wanted to hear/ read... same problem here, I have a Mac Pro with Sierra and I can't create a new item set... I didn't know it's an issue with the new update but this is really frustrating..   I really hope RIOT is working diligently to fix this for us Mac users with Sierra. I really need to update my Lulu {{champion:117}} sets and I don't have a PC to hop on a fix it..
Ok so you just can't create a website/web app to edit/create item sets in our account since it's server-side? You must be very busy doing shit.

Ah, thanks for the info. Is there going to be a fix anytime soon?

Also, I've noticed FPS issues (lower FPS than usual) after updating to Sierra, has this been experienced by others, and are Riot aware of this as a potential issue/bug?

Thanks

Same here, and the low fps thing too, that I assume happens randomly cuz i have nothing on and the frames move slow as hell. But if you notice a random fps drop in the middle of a game, its probably  ur mac is low. The fps usually rises back up when u charge it.
I accually have experienced better FPS with Sierra on my MB Pro. But how ever the " Not being able to do item sets " is annoying.
We use all Macs at our house, what do we do?  We don't have access to PC computer to set up item sets?

Er, what if you don't have another PC?

Is there a possibility an "Item Set Creator" will be made on the website?
I'm also having this issue, please fix.

This is so frustrating with the new items coming out and being tweaked. Especially for a support main. 

Can we get an estimate of when the bug will be fixed?

Thanks,
Dylan
Same problem here. I try to update Java (I don't know if it's related or not), but still not working.
It's still not working for me either, and I don't have another pc to do them, so I guess I'll just have to wait until the bug is fixed.. :(

Same issue for me trying to create a set for Master Yi. 

Will try on an older OS and see if it works - thanks for help all
I would like to second this! I'm trying to do that now on a mac and the problem is exactly described by this... well... this transcendent pig?
Very helpful thanks. I was having issues trying to create a Janna {{champion:40}}  set. Glad to know its not just me.
I had the same problem with my Mac after doing the update. I made a new item set on my laptop (not a Mac). It is a bit of a pain to do this, but it worked. Thanks for the tip.
Fix ur game rito{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Having also this issue. Please Riot fix some Mac problems plz.
I am still having this problem. Its so frustrating and riot needs to fix this asap
same problem here

i hate to be negative and make u think it won't happen but guys lets be honest riot can't fix lux hitbox do u really think they will be able to fix this bug... i think we got more chance of getting a new champion before then {{champion:99}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
I mean..I know we are Mac users and all, but please Riot Games..help us out on this one. No possible ETA on this bug?
I'm also experiencing this bug. Any timeline on a fix?
find a solution for this please its really annoying and affecting the game quality RIOT...{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Having the same problem here with item sets.. rito plz fix it soon!

I am having the same issue but it is also affecting my rune pages, not allowing me to make changes :(

FeelsBadMan

> [{quoted}](name=Ferry Tayle,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GVdAYANR,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-11-08T23:28:49.304+0000)
>
> I am having the same issue but it is also affecting my rune pages, not allowing me to make changes :(
> 
> FeelsBadMan

True, you can not drag the runes into place on the legacy client. You can however 'right click' the runes into place, or drag them into place on the new client.
Same here, If anyone finds a way to fix please tell ~ {{champion:133}} I hate having to search the store while my teammates die.
So glad to know its not just me! its been happening ever since i updated to OS Sierra, hopefully they come up with a fix too and i have also been getting FPS drops

Uuuggh! I was wondering if this was something related to league itself, but I honestly didn't think it'd have to do with the update of OS Sierra.
I'm really hoping that Riot does something about this, this is a really frustrating moment for those who work on their Item Sets... But I have to wonder; Is there a remote way to be able to work on your item sets other than using a separate computer? Isn't there a different site or something to be able to do this?
